about.title: About myself
about.paragraphOne: I am a computer scientist graduated in Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul in 2021.
about.paragraphTwo: Although I have experience with many languages and tools, I am currently working in the front-end side of things.
about.paragraphThree: Besides coding, I like sports, music, and video-games
